author: cms-sw
body:
Changes needed to build few more externals for RiscV
- ucx version 1.17.0 which has riscv support
- OpenBLAS 0.3.27 which as riscv support
- Explicitly disable zstd for curl to avoid build system picking it up from system
  - Can not use out zstd otherwise we have cyclic deps cmake -> curl -> zstd -> cmake 
- go 1.22.5 which is also available for riscv
title: riscv: update ucx, OpenBlas, go
